email="ashwin.nayak@jpmorgan.com" wishedChannel="0" type="paymentRequest"> <ctx> <email value="ashwin.nayak@jpmorgan.com"/> <requesterName value="ashwin"/> <text value="SHOW ME THE MONEY"/> <currency value="£"/> <amount value="101.00"/> | <requestedPaymentDate value="12/11/2019"/> <paymentLink value="www.google.co.uk"/> </ctx> </rtEvent> </urn:domEvent> </urn:PushEvent> </soapenv:Body>
